description:
Upgrade your Hydrapak reservoir with a high-flow valve for a large quantity of water when you need it the most.

  • High-grade silicone sheath provides a pleasant mouth feel
  • Dust cover prevents the collection of dirt
  • Self-seals after each sip and can be open and closed with one hand
  • Universal ¼ diameter fitting
name: Hydrapak Comet Bite Valve
